movies.title: Inherit the Wind
movies.plot: This gripping adaptation of the Jerome Lawrence-Robert E. Lee play examines an issue that still causes great controversyâ€”the role religion should play in the schools.
movies.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.

events.title: John Scopes is found guilty of teaching evolution
